directions: Combine chickpeas, cocoa powder, sugar, olive oil, peanut butter, vanilla extract, and salt in a food processor; blend, scraping down sides as needed, until smooth. Begin adding water while processor is running and blend until desired consistency is reached.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), rinsed and drained
3 tablespoons water, or more if needed
title: Brownie Batter Dip (aka Chocolate Hummus)
